attributes.action: create a 20mph limit outside Woodford primary school harrogate
attributes.additional_details: Woodford road should be reduced to a 20mph speed limit around the area of Woodford primary school. Even though some speed restriction bumps this does not reduce the speed of some.  With the additionof the new library on this site traffic has increased. This is for the safety of all children at the school and using the library.
